rewindSettings.title: Rewind Time Settings
rewindSettings.description: Automatically rewind when resuming playback to help recall context
rewindSettings.tempPlayRewindSubtitle: When returning to queue after temporary play

version.title: Version
version.tapToEnableDev: $n more taps to enable developer options

update.title: Check for Updates
update.checkGitHub: Check for new version on GitHub

developerOptions.title: Developer Options
developerOptions.subtitle: Debug tools and experimental features
developerOptions.ytStreamTestSubtitle: Test Audio-only / Muxed / HLS stream playback
developerOptions.resetSubtitle: Delete all playlists, play queue and settings (irreversible)
developerOptions.resetWarning:
This will delete all data, including:
• All playlists
• Play queue
• Search history
• App settings

This action is irreversible!
developerOptions.resetDone: Data reset, please restart the app
developerOptions.autoScrollSubtitle: Automatically scroll to current track in queue when switching songs

downloadManager.title: Download Manager
downloadManager.subtitle: Manage download queue and progress
downloadManager.clearQueueConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all download tasks?

downloadPath.title: Download Path
downloadPath.pathChangeWarning: Changing the path will clear download path records in database

downloadImage.title: Download Images
downloadImage.coverAndAvatarDescription: Download video covers and uploader avatars

imageCache.title: Image Cache Size
imageCache.clearConfirm: Clear all cached images? This will not affect downloaded local images.

tray.title: Minimize to tray
tray.subtitle: Minimize to system tray when closing window

hotkeys.title: Global Hotkeys
hotkeys.hint: Click on a hotkey area then press a new key combination
hotkeys.pressCombo:
Press a key combination

(At least one modifier key required)

qualityLevel.title: Global Quality Level
qualityLevel.subtitle: Applies to all sources
qualityLevel.mediumDescription: Medium bitrate, balanced quality and data

formatPriority.title: YouTube Format Priority
formatPriority.subtitle: Only applies to YouTube audio-only streams
formatPriority.opusDescription: Good quality, small size, less compatible

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.importPlaylistDesc: Tap import at top-right of library. Supports Bilibili/YouTube links and importing from NetEase, QQ Music, Spotify
quickStart.addToQueueDesc: Open a playlist and tap "Add All" to add songs to the play queue
quickStart.startPlaybackDesc: Tap any song to play, or use the bottom player controls

externalImport.title: External Playlist Import
externalImport.smartMatchDesc: Automatically search and match songs on Bilibili/YouTube
externalImport.previewDesc: Preview match results before importing, manually select alternatives or exclude songs

playbackControl.title: Playback Controls
playbackControl.shuffleDesc: Tap shuffle button to randomize play order
playbackControl.loopModeDesc: List loop, single loop, or no loop
playbackControl.speedDesc: Adjust playback speed in fullscreen player
playbackControl.positionMemoryDesc: Long videos (>10 min) automatically save position, resume on next play
playbackControl.tempPlayDesc: Tap a song in search/playlist to play temporarily, auto-restores original queue when done

search.title: Search
search.sortFilterDesc: Sort by relevance, views, date, or comments
search.liveFilterDesc: Bilibili search supports filtering live rooms (all/offline/online)
search.multiPDesc: Multi-part videos auto-detected, expand to view parts

liveRadio.title: Live & Radio
liveRadio.biliLiveDesc: Search live rooms, listen to live audio
liveRadio.autoRefreshDesc: Automatically refreshes when stream URL expires, maintains continuous playback

download.title: Download Music
download.setPathDesc: Configure download directory in Settings → Storage
download.downloadSongDesc: Tap "Download All" in playlist detail or download individual songs from menu
download.offlineDesc: Browse and play downloaded songs by playlist in "Downloaded"

explore.title: Explore
explore.rankingDesc: View Bilibili and YouTube music trending charts
explore.autoUpdateDesc: Charts refresh hourly in background, instant access with no wait

history.title: Play History
history.timelineDesc: View all play records in chronological order
history.statsDesc: View play count and other statistics
history.filterDesc: Filter and sort to quickly find songs

audioSettingsGuide.title: Audio Settings
audioSettingsGuide.formatPriorityDesc: Choose Opus or AAC format for YouTube

ytMix.dynamicPlaylistDesc: Import YouTube Mix/Radio playlists, automatically loads more songs
ytMix.infinitePlayDesc: Automatically fetches new songs when approaching queue end

appUpdate.title: App Updates
appUpdate.checkUpdateDesc: Settings → About → Check for Updates, fetches latest version from GitHub
appUpdate.autoInstallDesc: Android auto-installs APK after download, Windows auto-replaces on update
